title: Is telepathy a form of mind control? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, mental telepathy is not really a form of mind control, but mental telepathy can be used as a form of planting a suggestion or suggestions into a person's mind to do certain things and tricking the person into thinking that such thoughts to perform a certain action or actions are the person's own thoughts. On the 1960's science fiction tv show “Star Trek", the Vulcan character Mister Spock would use his strong power of deep mental telepathy, at even a far enough distance away, to clandestinely strongly influence someone in doing certain actions without the person knowing he or she is being telepathically strongly tempted to do, and the person would follow the urge.

It’s impossible to give concrete answers about things that aren’t real. There are certainly human methods which can be used to influence others, but mind control, telepathy, or any other supernatural abilities are not real things.
